description: This dataset contains the super workflow steps for library and information professionals to execute knowledge organization in both analog and digital environments.
steps: Analyze the nature and format of information resources.
Determine appropriate metadata standards (MARC, Dublin Core, BIBFRAME, MODS, etc.).
Conduct subject analysis and apply controlled vocabulary (LCSH, MeSH, AAT).
Establish authority control for names, subjects, and titles.
Design and create resource descriptions using cataloging rules (RDA, ISBD).
Assign classification numbers and indexing terms.
Validate metadata against authority files and controlled vocabularies.
Publish records to bibliographic databases or digital repositories.
Ensure ongoing metadata maintenance and version control.
Facilitate user access through discovery tools and search interfaces.
